post:
<center>It hasn't been a month since my last ad as I've been trying to do but there were [some changes made](https://talk.lowendspirit.com/discussion/930/smallweb-planned-changes "some changes").

---

We have a global reach with 8 available locations.

Amsterdam | Germany | Los Angeles | Luxembourg | London | Melbourne | New York | Singapore 

[You can view our hosting server specifications here.](https://portal.smallweb.net/blog/hosting-server-specifications "You can view our hosting server specifications here.")

---

**Some of our features:**
NVMe or SSD Storage
Remote Daily Backups
DNS Zone Management 
Free Softaculous Installer
Free Let’s Encrypt SSL 
Free Website Migration
Unlimited SQL Databases
Unlimited Email Accounts
Unlimited FTP Accounts
CloudLinux CageFS/LVE
Multi PHP Version Selector
99.9% Uptime Guarantee
30 Day Refund Policy

---

**Shared ½GB - £3.99/year**
½GB NVMe/SSD - 100GB Monthly Bandwidth - 1 Websites - 1CPU, 20EP & 5MB/s I/O
